contentitemdata.k13store.productsku.SKUDescription:
Who can make a cup of coffee if not an Italian? This Italian-made espresso electric grinder is one of the best solutions for home and professional use. The Macap M4D is a super easy to use and yet highly expert appliance – only one button, an LED display providing information to ensure a precise dose, and a stepless adjustment wheel for the best quality grinding. This beautiful grinder and its flat steel burrs are powered by a high-performance 250-Watt engine.

  • Stepless adjustment wheel for grinding
  • Three different settings of grinding dosage – 1-cup, 2-cup, and continuous
  • 250-Watt engine
  • Made in Venice, Italy

Specifications:

  • 16.9" H x 7.5" W x 12.2" D (43 cm H x 19 cm W x 31 cm D)
  • 22 lb (10 kg)
  • Blade diameter: 2.3" (5.8 cm)
contentitemdata.k13store.productsku.SKUShortDescription: Macap M4D is an easy-to-use, highly expert electric grinder with a stepless adjustment wheel for various settings.
